title: Internal mobile app for company
desc: I am looking for a quote for a client and need it asap, please. Details are below.BRIEFClient has 3000+ employees and wants to create an internal app in order to a) promote happiness in the workplace and b) collect data in order to improve happiness in the workplace. We want to give employees an easy, quick and fun tool in which to provide feedback and which is easily accessible through their smart phones. Once the app is launched, management want to be able to interact/collect data/manage the tool via an easy to use web based portal.DEADLINE•	The app should be ready to launch by 28 September.•	Due to time constraints, the app can be launched in phases, with the first phase being ready by no later than 28 September.REQUIREMENTS & FUNCTIONALITY•	App should be able to be branded using company branding (note that we can provide all graphics required, just need exact sizes etc)•	The app should be available/accessible on both android and IOS devices•	The app should be able to measure results through employee feedback•	Results should be easily converted for management analysis, preferably through a web based portal function, so they know which areas to focus on more (whether it be a particular department or general employee perception on a certain topic)•	Employees, or selected non-employees we want to share secure login credentials with, should be able to login to the app exclusively, either using their work email credentials or another secure system (whichever is more cost effective)Employee data collectionThe information needed from each employee (for later analysis) should include:•	Name•	Surname•	Birthday•	Nationality•	Employee ID number•	Department (list of departments will be provided)•	Work location (list of office locations will be provided)Calendar functionalityA calendar that employees can check daily and has the ability to show:•	Employee birthdays•	Happiness events•	Holidays•	Upcoming training etcManagement should be able to enter this information daily/weekly via a web based portalQuote of the day functionality•	Allow for a morning ‘pop up’ functionality where management can include a ‘quote of the day’ with nice image in the background•	This should pop up at 6am everyday (and read when user opens app)•	Management should be able to upload this information daily/weekly via a web based portalDaily/Weekly/Monthly Survey functionality•	Employees should be able to post daily ‘happiness level’ through a ‘HaPmometer’ where they can choose either a) green smiling face for happy, b) neutral yellow face c) unhappy red face•	This should be posted at 3pm each day (and read when user opens app)•	This function should pop up on either a daily or weekly basis, employees should have to fill this in before they can further explore the app/see any other messages or updates•	Management need to be able to analyze ‘HaPmometer’ feedback on a weekly or monthly basis through an auto web based application, and also provide feedback to employees•	Management want to be able to post questions to employees on a regular basis and analyze feedback•	Notification function should be included so that employees see they have a ‘new message’ or ‘update’ of some kind (in order to get them to participate) on their phone ‘desktop’Image share/Video/Newsfeed functionalityThere should be a functionality where employees can add photos/videos/make an announcement, e.g.•	Birth of child•	Wedding•	Charity event•	Personal self-improvement activities•	‘Like’ button to be included so employees can participate•	Comment section should be optional (will confirm whether we want to include this or not)Feedback functionalityThe app should include a function where employees can:•	Ask a question•	Give feedback•	Make a suggestionThere should also be room for more functionality in the future, but these are some of the basics we want to start with.

title: IOS Game prototype - Draw lines on a piece of paper
desc: I would like to build a game prototype, where user draws lines on A4-paperlike view. For the the game prototype I have three main requirements. (Note! see attached picture)1) Programatically create a square-paper like view, to which user can draw lines.2) Lines can only be drawn through crossing of the squares.3) Lines need to be drawn horizontally, vertically or diagonal.You need to be able to do following:PAPER VIEWProgramatically generate A4-squarepaper-like view.View must have varying gridsize, minimum 100 x 100 squares.Grid-view needs to be zoomable.LINESLenght of the line is fixed to 5 squares.New line need to cross existing lines.Draw line by point using finger at starting point and dragging toend-point.Lines are not allowed to overlap each other, only cross each other.Undo line functionality/buttonSCORINGKeep count of number of linesTrack timeBefore bidding see attached picture(, which shows prototype on real paper).For the prototype I am not willing to pay more than 50EUR (non-negotiable). I will prioritize those bidders who are able to give me estimate how fast you are able to produce working prototype.

title: Mobile Web App: Music Reading for Piano - open to bidding
desc: Hello, I'm a music teacher and would like to test some concepts for a web application.  This will be an alpha version and will not be release for commercial use.  It may be used in my own teaching but will not be distributed to the public.The main functions:- Users will use the app to read and organize a virtual library of music books.  They can login, create and organize lists of books, search for books and filter their results, and leave reviews for books similar to Amazon.com.- Users can view a book full-screen and turn pages by swiping (mobile), clicking/tapping on a side of the screen, or using their keypad (left, right arrow keys).- The administrator (myself) can upload books and manage the library.- The administrator can send lists to other users.I have considered building this around an existing CMS platform (Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla) but it is a project beyond my skills and experience.  As this is purely for testing a concept, simplicity, functionality, and efficiency are preferred over appearance and overly complicated functionality.I have consulted for app developers in the past but have never functioned as a project manager or overseen any professional software development.  I'm looking for someone who can ask questions, learn about my vision, and suggest changes as necessary.  Open to any and all feedback, ideas, or guidance with this project.Please also advise - how many hours, weeks, etc. you would expect for something like this.  We can speak before creating a quote if that's better.Thank you.

title: Create web platform for sending and analysing surveys to set group of people
desc: I am looking to create a web platform that allows managers to create organisations, members of the organisation and surveys (surveys only have one type of answer: a 1-5 scale). The surveys can be sent out to individual members or groups within the organisation via mail and accessed via the website. The managers will have access to a dashboard showing them carious statistics about the organisation based on the answers of the employees and comparisons with aggregated data from other organisations.This project should initially work via a website and the notifications on new surveys via mails. The finished product should also include an iOS and Android app that gives access to the above service and notifies users via push-messages.Details on Features:1) For managers of an organisation* Creating organisational entities (divisions, teams) and hierarchies amongst the entities* Creating users with a small number of attributes (job, entities they are assigned to, potentially other attributes like “manager”, e-mail, ...)* Creating questionnaires (from scratch or from pre-filled templates) w. 1-5 answer scale* Scheduling and directly sending out the questionnaires to members that should be quickly accessible from any kind of device* Ability to (automatically) split up questionnaires into bite-sized units that automatically get scheduled to be sent out one after another over a specified time-period* Automatically aggregating all the (anonymized) answers in a management tool/view of the service that allows for some viewing stats about the answers, comparing them to other organisations and (not too elaborate) slicing and dicing* Automatically notifying a pre-defined list of people via message if results of a question or questionnaire differ significantly from a certain value2) For members of an organisation* Getting a message about a new questionnaire* Answering questionnaires quickly* Getting reminders if a questionnaire is not answered* Ability to access all unanswered questions of a questionnaire at once3) For administrators of this web service* Same features as managers* See statistics across all organisations* Set up templates for questionnaires* Reach out to managers or members of organisations on the service via the service* Manually set thresholds for when a (aggregated) questionnaire answer is too high/low and warrants a notificationDetails on project* I would like to get an estimate for the development work required and additionally an overview about potential other costs (licences, hosting, etc.)
